pages.title: Upgrading an Oven
pages.text: The $(l:fumes/fumes)Witches Oven$(/l) can be upgraded by placing either a $(l:fumes/funnels#normal)Fume Funnel$(/l) or a $(l:fumes/funnels#filtered)Filtered Fume Funnel$(/l) to the left and right of it. A $(item)Witches Oven$() can use at most two upgrades and must have the same facing of the oven.
A Fume Funnel can increase the cooking speed of the $(item)Witches' Oven$() by 10% and the chance of by-product by an additional 25%.

A Filtered Fume Funnel also increases the cooking speed of the $(item)Witches' Oven$() by 10% but increases the chance of by-product of 30%. A fully-upgraded Oven can cook at 130% the speed of a $(item)Furnace$() and a 90% chance of generating by-products.
A $(item)Filtered Fume Funnel$() is created by crafting together a $(item)Fume Funnel$() with a $(item)Fume Filter$()
